item.description:
We are having TWO meetings this month! On the 13th, we'll hear from a social networking guru. Adam Weiss has spoken before the National Assoc. of Women Business Owners, among other groups, and is extremely knowledgeable about all things internet.

He will talk with us about how to use Facebook, Linked In, Tweets, Pod Casts, etc. all to your advantage -- to grow your business!

Please let me know if you have any specific areas or topics you want him to cover. There's a questionnaire attached.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.name: Social Networking: Make it Work for YOU!
